modules.serial_labware.IKA_microstar_75 package¶

Submodules¶

modules.serial_labware.IKA_microstar_75.IKA_microstar_75 module¶

:mod:”IKA_microstar_75” – API for IKA microstar 7.5 remote controllable overhead stirrer¶

  1. 2018 The Cronin Group, University of Glasgow

This provides a python class for the IKA microstar 7.5 overhead stirrer based on software developed by the Cronin Group. The command implementation is based on the German manual pages 32-34.

For style guide used see http://xkcd.com/1513/

class modules.serial_labware.IKA_microstar_75.IKA_microstar_75.IKAmicrostar75(port=None, device_name=None, connect_on_instantiation=False, soft_fail_for_testing=False)[source]¶

Bases: SerialDevice.serial_labware.SerialDevice

This provides a python class for the IKA microstar 7.5 overhead stirrers The command implementation is based on the German manual pages 32-34.

property direction¶

Returns the current stirring direction

Returns

either “cw” or “ccw” depending on the currently set direction

property name¶

Returns the name of the stirrer

Returns

call back to send_message with a request to return the name

start_stirrer()[source]¶

Starts the stirring operation. Since the stirrer “forgets” the current stir rate every time “START” is sent, the method first queries the current setpoint, then starts the stirrer, then sets the RPM again.

property stir_rate_pv¶

Reads the process variable (i.e. the current) stir rate

Returns

call back to send_message with a request to return and check a value

property stir_rate_sp¶

Reads the set point (target) for the stir rate

Returns

call back to send_message with a request to return and check a value

stop_stirrer()[source]¶

Stops the stirring operation.

Returns

call back to send_message with a request to stop the stirring

property temperature_pv¶

Reads the process variable (i.e. the current) temperature

Returns

call back to send_message with a request to return and check a value
